message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within my budget. Would you be open to selling it for $120?
Hi Bob, I understand your concern about staying within your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $135. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
